Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in dismissing the applicant's refugee claim
Credibility_Assessment: The Board found inconsistencies in the applicant's testimony and deemed his fear implausible
Evidence_Type: Testimonial evidence, documentary evidence related to legal dispute in India
Legal_Provision: Sections of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act relating to refugee protection and eligibility
Basis_of_Claim: Persecution due to threats and kidnapping related to a legal matter in India
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credibility of the applicant and plausibility of the claimed risk
Proceeding_Type: Refugee claim determination followed by judicial review
Application_Error: Alleged error in assessing credibility and plausibility
Application_Factor: Consistency of testimony, plausibility of events
Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Board's decision was reasonable
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, sections on refugee claims and protection
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to the reasonableness of the Board's decision
Procedural_Issue: Compliance with procedural requirements for refugee claims
